name: A Midnight Train (2023)
description:
After an unexpected stop on your way home at night, you end up at a seemingly harmless subway station. In a short amount of time, you come to find that this station has more to it than bad lighting and eerie sounds though. 
Find out what or who is waiting for you and see if you are able to leave the station in one piece... 

A short horror game inspired by imaginations running wild while traveling alone at night

"A Midnight Train" is currently in Early Access and will be officially released on May 1st. Feel free to report bugs!
